verbose_text: Currently available evidences suggest that AMPK and SIRT1 display mutual interactions with each other; AMPK could activate SIRT1 by increasing cellular NAD + level via promoting expression of nicotinamide phosphoribosyltransferase (Nampt), a rate limiting enzyme in NAD + biosynthesis; however, SIRT1 can also directly deacetylate and activate LKB1, resulting in the activation and phosphorylation of AMPK [XREF_BIBR].
